mapper.insert: insert into manager(email,name,password, user_name, gender, age, tel_no, role) values(#{email},#{name},#{password},#{userName}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{telNo}, #{role})
mapper.select: select email, password, role from manager where email=#{email} and password=#{password}
select email, name, role from manager where email=#{email}
mapper.update: update manager set age=#{age}, name=#{name}, password=#{password}, user_name=#{userName} where email=#{email}
mapper.select: select password from manager where email=#{email}
select count(email) from manager where email=#{email}
select count(*) from set_top where email=#{email}
mapper.insert: insert into token(email, refreshtoken_manager) values(#{email},#{refreshToken}) on duplicate key update refreshtoken_manager = #{refreshToken}
